It's funny, in any normal state this would be a vanilla doujin. The captain is hard on him, but that doesn't mean that he's an absolute asshole, hell he doesn't seem to hate the guy he says "Hey you wear the same hat as always." and they are really just happy to be married. Konami in this doujin (He the girl and the senpai are all from a Konami baseball game) seems more like a loser than ever because he lets his past failures define him, and in the end regresses while the rest of the world moves on.

This isn't netorare,its realistic. And the guy isn't even a bully,he is just using "disciplinary man talk",very common in sports circles.  This is only "sad' because we are seeing trough the eyes of the MC and putting ourselves in his place. Yeah,we all have that one person we liked when we were young and she ended up dating someone we "hated" or just were envious of. Just because MC holds a grudge against the guy doesn't he is a bad guy and just because he liked the girl doesn't mean he is entilted to her,even more considering he didn't even told her how he felt. Hell,she even put his hand on her preg belly,so she certainly doesn't hate him. My point is that most of the suffering mc has is caused by himself and his feelings and not by the couple.

Haaa, this was just too much for him. 1. Treated like shit presumably for 4 baseball club years. 2. The ringleader who has it out for him also gets the girl, who was probably the only one who treated him nicely in those 4 years if she made him feel glad to be alive. 3. He resolves not to use the image (who in his shoes wouldn't peeked at that moment with those feelings for a girl + worst enemy = potentially worst situation type of scenario, it's one of those things that you really don't want to know, but can't help it because the side of you that needs to know takes over, it's a terrifying nightmare for both men and women.) of her getting fucked by none other but his tormentor, at that, as fap material. 4. Not only does he not make it to 1st division, locking him mentally out of ever viewing himself worthy (he seems self aware about his situation) of her, but he has to learn that on top of getting the girl,he also got networked into a high pay cozy job. It's too much and it all stacks.
